items.description: Customize the List View settings for a Doctype.
Add extra columns to the list.
items.example:
// Show the status and priority in the Task list
add_fields: ["status", "priority"]

items.description: Add a default filter to the list.
items.example:
// Only show tasks that are 'Open'
filters: [["status", "=", "Open"]]

items.description: Define a status indicator with color and filter.
Format the content of the added columns.

items.example:
// Useful if the title or subject is already a clear identifier
hide_name_column: true
